com.google.android.exoplayer

Interface SampleSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChunkSampleSource, ExtractorSampleSource, FrameworkSampleSource, HlsSampleSource, SingleSampleSource

    public interface SampleSource
    A source of media samples.

    A SampleSource may expose one or multiple tracks. The number of tracks and each track's media format can be queried using SampleSource.SampleSourceReader.getTrackCount() and SampleSource.SampleSourceReader.getFormat(int) respectively.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SampleSource.SampleSourceReader
      An interface providing read access to a SampleSource.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int END_OF_STREAM
      The end of stream has been reached.
      static int FORMAT_READ
      A format was read.
      static long NO_DISCONTINUITY
      Returned from SampleSource.SampleSourceReader.readDiscontinuity(int) to indicate no discontinuity.
      static int NOTHING_READ
      Neither a sample nor a format was read in full.
      static int SAMPLE_READ
      A sample was read.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SampleSource.SampleSourceReader register()
      A consumer of samples should call this method to register themselves and gain access to the source through the returned SampleSource.SampleSourceReader.

    • Field Detail

      • END_OF_STREAM

        static final int END_OF_STREAM
        The end of stream has been reached.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NOTHING_READ

        static final int NOTHING_READ
        Neither a sample nor a format was read in full. This may be because insufficient data is buffered upstream. If multiple tracks are enabled, this return value may indicate that the next piece of data to be returned from the SampleSource corresponds to a different track than the one for which data was requested.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAMPLE_READ

        static final int SAMPLE_READ
        A sample was read.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FORMAT_READ

        static final int FORMAT_READ
        A format was read.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NO_DISCONTINUITY

        static final long NO_DISCONTINUITY
        Returned from SampleSource.SampleSourceReader.readDiscontinuity(int) to indicate no discontinuity.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • register

        SampleSource.SampleSourceReader register()
        A consumer of samples should call this method to register themselves and gain access to the source through the returned SampleSource.SampleSourceReader.

        SampleSource.SampleSourceReader.release() should be called on the returned object when access is no longer required.

        Returns:
        A SampleSource.SampleSourceReader that provides access to the source.
